title: Batman vs. Two-Face
overview: Former Gotham City District Attorney Harvey Dent, one side of his face scarred by acid, goes on a crime spree based on the number '2'. All of his actions are decided by the flip of a defaced, two-headed silver dollar.

title: Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie
overview: When a ghost-infecting virus known as Fire-Starter begins spreading through the system resulting in the assassination of the Japanese Prime Minister, Major Motoko Kusanagi and her elite team of special operatives are called in to track down its source.
actors: Maaya Sakamoto, Motoko Kusanagi (voice), Kenichirou Matsuda, Batou (voice), Kazuya Nakai, Borma (voice), Ikkyu Juku, Daisuke Aramaki (voice), Kenji Nojima, Tsumugi (voice), Mayumi Asano, Kurutsu (voice), Megumi Han, Chris (voice), Miyuki Sawashiro, Logicoma (voice), Mugihito, Robert Lee (voice)
orig_title: 攻殻機動隊 新劇場版
